project_plan.name: Command-Line Temperature Converter Tool
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool in Python that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin, allowing users to specify input temperature and desired output unit.

task.name: Implement Temperature Conversion Functionality (Celsius to Fahrenheit and Kelvin)
Implement Temperature Conversion Functionality (Fahrenheit to Celsius and Kelvin)
Implement Temperature Conversion Functionality (Kelvin to Celsius and Fahrenheit)
Implement User Input Handling and Display Results
Write tests for each of the conversion functionalities and the input handling
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
